name: U.S. R&D expenditures, by type of R&D: Selected years, 2000–20
description: U.S. R&D expenditures, by type of R&D: Selected years, 2000–20

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Billions of current dollars, constant 2012 dollars, and percent distribution

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data throughout the time series reported here are consistently based on the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development's Frascati Manual (OECD 2015) definitions for basic research, applied research, and experimental development. Prior to 2010, however, some changes were introduced in the questionnaires of the sectoral expenditure surveys to improve the accuracy of respondents' classification of their R&D by type. Accordingly, small percentage changes in the historical data may not be meaningful.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Patterns of R&D Resources (2019–20 edition).Science and Engineering Indicators
